author: Alejandro Mejia
comment: Can't post on groups since latest update

author: Yunus Kojar
comment: Why alter day updates?

author: Ricardo de Castro
comment: Everytime i share a post the selection box gets stuck and i cant get out of whatevr im sharing...

author: Emma Clay
comment: My mobile keeps telling me the app is causing my phone to run slowly at least 17 times a week!! Please sort it out!!!!!!!!!! Fed up of it causing me problems.

author: abdul shareef
comment: Earlier it was good but now a days its complete disappointed me . Ek dam kachra ha gaya hai bahut problem ho raha hai . Agar ye prob thik nahi hua to me use delete kardunga .

author: Andreia Silva
comment: The app won't open and keeps crashing since the latest update. Please fix.
Need to fix this update, it keeps on freezing.

author: prabhu kumar
comment: stuking after share any photo after every share I need to restart the app

author: Bayazid Rahman
comment: Love

author: Gary Haynes
comment: Don't  update from Aptoid. Buggy. Hold down for menu window. Can't  back out or close menu. Must pick menu item.

author: annaliza Tabernilla
comment: The problem that I encounter as of now is I can't change my e-mail address and that's the worse part. I'm stuck on trouble loading

author: Sarah Javed
comment: The l latest update as of 2/28 is extremely buggy.

author: M Δ R I E
comment: too much bug since the last update

author: WAWA LAPOK
comment: Good

author: Abner Morgan
comment: The social media site that dethroned MySpace, and had its app later challenged by Instagram and Snapchat. I don't like posts being shown on my feed in random order. Still the best for more long-form, text - driven posts. Taking pics and adding photos from Instagram and Snapchat is pretty easy. Even if you spend more time on other apps, if you have friends over 35, this is worth the download.

author: Kendra VanEpps
comment: I have had to  download and redownload and download and redownload this off about 15 times that has 24 hours another 4 times today wth and again 3 times in the past 5 minutes GET IT TOGH a month later and I am still downloading and re downloading this app several times a day!!!  Come on FACEBOOK I have had to uninstall and reinstall this app at least 30 times since yesterday WHY do you think that is? Because your trying to make something that was already perfect better and it WAS better before!!! Praying someone makes another app to keep in contact because you just can't use Facebook anymore

author: Annaliese Slobecheski
comment: Since the lastest update, both the FB app and marketplace keep crashing. I've tried everything to fix it and nothing is working. I'm over it. At least every other day there is a new update each of which presents a new problem. For such a widely used app I would think that it could be designed properly. Instead of focusing on aesthetics perhaps focusing on getting the app to actually work would be a better idea.

author: Wilfredo Miguel Domingo
comment: The most successful company of all social media can't even make an optimized application for every device. I'm already rocking an Android Oreo device (stock) and yet it can' t even make it snappy and crisp. It lags whenever I press a photo. It really thought that I'm pressing it hold but I only press it to view. Also the scrolling part really is tbe icing on the cake. Please make the app perform faster!!!

author: James Maxwell
comment: Regularly pulls me out of what I'm looking at. Can be watching a video or reading comments and it pulls me out to the menu where you can select the option "most recent"  I don't have a computer at the moment so it can be quite frustrating to start reading something or watch something and get pulled away from it. I'm using a Samsung Galaxy S8.  Also this was a problem for older versions too.

author: A Google User
comment: I keep getting kicked out of market place every time I try to share an item through messenger.  It is also kicking me out of otger areas on Facebook.  PLEASE FIX THIS!   I only updated because I got tired of seeing that it needed to be updated lol and now it's worse than its ever been.  Hopefully it will be fixed so I can give it a better rating like before.

author: Meagan Eichler
comment: Running TERRIBLY for the last few weeks. Won't load or loads the same 10 posts on a loop. Super frustrating that I can't get to my groups or my own profile. It just says it's loading until I give up and quit.  2 stars for helping me stay off social media!

author: Charity
comment: If I need to edit a post, it tries to "reupload" the whole post. It then lays and makes my whole app not load cause its trying to update my post (which it doesnt actually update)  Also HATE if a video is longer than 1 minute, a stupid ad plays. Most of the time, as soon as I see the "ad is about to play.." I scroll. Not wasting my time and giving y'all credits for something I don't want to deal with.

author: Michaela Gibson
comment: Tapping on the FB icon takes me to playstore... not sure why but this update sucks and wasted my time2013. 5 years later im leaving another review 2018.. my messenger tells me i have an unread message i click on it and there isn't anything there!!!!! Fix this asap its very annoying.

author: Shovan Das
comment: Why so many updates? Why can't you guys make an app that runs for at least 6 months without asking for update.. Whatever we have in the latest app is enough. We don't need anything else.. Stop asking for update.. And stop inserting bug in outdated versions so that people can use whatever version he wants..

author: Shannon Workman
comment: I like that it was added emojis into the LIKE button when you tap and hold on the like and can choose either the heart, laughing, shocked, sad or the angry emojis. I would love it if the Blowing Kisses (😘 ) emoji was added also. What you guys think? 🤔 ☺

author: Mellie Girl
comment: When I select Most Recent, I expect to see my friends latest posts. Unfortunately that's not what I get. I'm not sure what it is showing the most recent of but it isn't my friends posts. There's no way way to see this, in the app or web version. Your designers need to go back to school to learn what "most recent" means. I find myself going from friend page to friend page to see their latest stuff and I really shouldn't have to. Facebook is mostly useless anymore. Maybe it's more for people who like to have thousands of friends. That ain't me.

author: Simon Mbuthia
comment: The app is virtually unusable on the Redmi Pro. Keep getting ANR as soon as I scroll down in the app  Update: the bug that causes the app to crash has never been fixed, despite numerous updates from the time I fist shared my review. Very poor user experience

author: Eru Hemi
comment: Cant go live says check my internet connection even though im sitting right nect to the Wi-Fi or my data is on haha.. have tryed updating it. Un installing then re download it still doesn't work

author: patrick boylan
comment: Well besides the who app being about as far left as you can get. It's not bad. They still haven't figured out how to sort pictures on your device. Hint hint. We are in 2018. That and you get randomly blocked from posting if the ass clowns at FB decided that what ever you posted voilated some magical standard that is about a fluid and a cup of water. So in the end. It's just not worth having this app or even the program. It's a joke.

author: kirsty kirkham
comment: It's now saying I no longer have use of market place why not I have stuff for sale on their and since latest update I can't get into market place it's not even present on my screen menu as an option!!!!???? Please sort this out I have items for sale and potential buyers for items I can't speak to because of this major issue.

author: Mado Zamora fg
comment: my fb account is hacked. almost a month. I tried to log in it but it always showed up like this. UNFORTUNATELY, YOU WON'T BE ABLE TO ACCESS YOUR ACCOUNT WHILE WE'RE REVIEWING THESE ADDITIONAL DOCUMENTS. how can we retrieve it?  pleass help me to back my account

author: Dan Falvey
comment: Has always been #1 in social media, but they've broken it now. Feed is all over the place and I see posts from a fortnight ago, repeatedly, I even if I refresh. I have no idea whether there's anything new as the order I'm shown it makes no sense. It's not for browsing any more, so I don't bother with it. Make it sequential again (like Twitter!) and maybe it'll be worth another go.

author: edward vt
comment: Last update screwed it up again/more. Videos not playing until I hit play 3 times, and can't post anything now either. Does face book do any quality control before throwing up another "update"????

author: Michèle Chappaz
comment: Ever since the new algorithm has been added, there are ads every other post and they are often embedded videos. There are TOO many. Please go back to the way it was before. It was working so well creating community. Now is just another advertising wasteland.

author: Alexandre Saccol
comment: Utter trash, features aren't consistent with one another. For instance, the app uses so much memory that it can't properly save its state upon switching to another app, making you have to look for the post you were going to comment on when you come back. You, the user, go and search for the post in the search bar. You find the post and click it. What happens? The post is displayed in some kind of card, likely the mobile site on the system's web rendering engine. Comments are nowhere to be seen, and trying to add one does nothing. It's simply amazing.

author: ryuu sarashiki
comment: Actually i like Facebook app ,but i hate when pick some photo. What you think when you have 5000 pictures and want upload old picture ,you should roll down many times .i think Facebook must have more menu for make easy searching picture in gallery phone.

author: Kaley Schenk
comment: Would love to delete this update. Can no longer take screenshots when on a specific person's profile. Guess Facebook can't be held accountable for enforcing their own rules if it's impossible to provide any evidence when you report people! Unsurprisingly garbage behavior from a garbage company.

It's okay. I like the website better. The only negative thoughts I have about FB is the connection between people who are listed on some one's friends list are also listed in the FB contacts of everybody on a person's friends list.   This is a hassle for the people who don't know that other person on a friend's list of friends.  That feature could be omitted or changed.

author: Steven Wicks
comment: Do we really need those annoying ads everytime we watch a video? I hate the layout in the comments section of a post. Half the screen is taken up with the write a comment box when sometimes I just want to look at the comments

author: Chris Underhay
comment: This app is full of bugs and constantly stays on, this is to track my movements and access my camera and microphone, it is written in the code itself to restart and report everything about me. The features don't work properly, suck as being stuck with a group in my feed because unfollow doesn't work. I had to access my PC to fix many problems because the app didn't work as expected. I've had several unhandled exceptions which have resulted in termination. Your app is no good, your coding skills are no good and your business practices in selling information to China are plain disgusting. Have a nice day.
